Summary: a bright light in the sky move a slow pace
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Taylor
There were no other sightings in Taylor on or around April 12th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsi work at mcdonld's and this the second time i have seen something in this area. it's about 5:45 im doing my normal rutonie. i look up for a sec something caught my eye. it's not a plane no green or red flashing lights. this thing was a soild white. it came from the east and did a sharp right turn going northeast towards Detroit. i was freakin out a little. it was moving slow no sound. i was watching it for a good 4-5 min. it was going past i-75 NE and that was the last i saw of it.
